title: Investment Advisor Two Prime Sees $2B in Demand for Bitcoin-Backed Loans
description: "We have seen about $2 billion in demand for bitcoin-secured loans since we started offering them in September, " Two Prime's Alexander Blume said.

title: TrustWallet's TWT Falls as Parent Company Binance Releases Web3 Wallet
description: TrustWallet's native token [TWT] has plunged over the past few hours after Binance, the exchange that acquired TrustWallet in 2018, releases its own competing web3 wallet.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Analysis: ETH Bullish Momentum Sluggish, But Bulls Still In Control
description: Ethereum’s bullish momentum has shown signs of slowing, with the price struggling to clear the resistance at $1920, with the price currently trading at $1880. While ETH is moving lower, downsides may be limited below $1850.

title: Debunking Bitcoin Myths: Fidelity’s Comprehensive 9-Point Takedown
description: Fidelity Digital Assets revisited the common Bitcoin (BTC) criticisms that most institutional investors pose before allocating funds to the mother coin. The most pressing concerns posed by investors are the probability of a killer Bitcoin bug, retrogressive regulations, lack of interest from investors, and unknown parameters. Amid the high adoption of digital assets by institutional [...]

title: Breaking: Circle Contemplates IPO in Early 2024 as USDC Gains Momentum
description: Circle, the issuer of USDC, is reportedly considering an IPO in early 2024 amid a recovering crypto market. The stablecoin issuer’s market capitalization has seen a significant dip since its peak, but recent developments hint at a strategic move towards a public listing. In the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency finance, a recent update from Bloomberg [...]

title: GRT Likely To Retrace Short Term, Despite Bullish On-Chain Metrics
description:
The Graph (GRT) has nearly doubled in price since 19 October 2023 and may continue to rise, according to the blockchain intelligence platform Santiment. In an X post published earlier today, Santiment noted that the altcoin has seen “major whale movement” with several new addresses being created on-chain. Santiment also revealed that the mean dollar […]

The post GRT Likely To Retrace Short Term, Despite Bullish On-Chain Metrics appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Crypto Trader Highly Bullish on Bitcoin, Says Massive BTC Parabola Is Forming – But There’s a Catch
description:
A closely followed crypto strategist and trader believes that Bitcoin (BTC) is in the early stages of a parabolic surge. Crypto analyst Kevin Svenson tells his 130,100 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin tends to go on a parabolic surge during its pre-halving year. The halving, which is slated for April 2024, […]

The post Crypto Trader Highly Bullish on Bitcoin, Says Massive BTC Parabola Is Forming – But There’s a Catch appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
